import React, { useState } from 'react' import {SelectedDetailsState} from '../Context/SelectedDetails' const PaymentPage = () => { const {selectedPlan} = SelectedDetailsState(); const [cardNumber,setCardNumber] = useState(); const [exp,setExp] = useState(); cosnt [cvc,setCvc] = useState(); const submitHandler = ()=>{ } return (
Complete Payment
Enter your credit or debit card details
{setCardNumber(e)}}/> {setExp(e)}}/> {setCvc(e)}}/>
Order Summary
Plan Name
{selectedPlan.name}
Billing Cycle
{selectedPlan.period}
Plan price
₹{selectedPlan.price}/mo
) } export default PaymentPage
